rules.description: Swap option and command in External keyboard
Change caps_lock key to control+option+command if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone. (Use command+caps_lock as caps_lock)
Post escape if left_control is pressed alone.
Workaround for pressing Esc after ⌘+⌃+Q not able to turn off the screen
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
Swap option and command in External keyboard
Change left_control key to control+option+command, to escape when pressed alone.
Change caps_lock key to control if pressed with other keys, to escape if pressed alone. (Use command+caps_lock as caps_lock)
Change fn + I/J/K/L to Arrow Keys
Quit application by pressing command-q twice
